channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
Oops, I had placed my bet on the ‚ÄúThe Emergencies Act would be in effect for more than two weeks‚Äù square. https://t.co/ko1aZYsNFd
Don‚Äôt worry, I‚Äôve already started stress-eating in anticipation of every side of the debate saying ‚ÄúI told you so!‚Äù

I bet the Russian ministers synced their watches and Putin changed the time on his watch so that the people on Twitter who zoom in on everything would come to the erroneous conclusion that the meeting was pre-recorded. https://t.co/q3rzOEVb5o

@nsylianteng I work at the same time as a group of people in India, so I cobbled together a bash script, invoked by TextExpander. I just type ;time and it asks me for a time in 24-hour format, and it converts that for our whole team. My hands never leave the keyboard. https://t.co/nAi3rpWALb
A new office tower? With a virus out there that kills everybody on impact? https://t.co/wfg7rCwySV

Revue Cinema again comes through and honours the assumptions of ticketholders who bought their tickets under a different regulatory requirement (which ends soon, a month before April 4th). https://t.co/WjtwKa1gYi
@dailysimpsons Fox produced a mockumentary called Springfield of Dreams: The Legend of Homer Simpson in 2017. It‚Äôs funny to me that George F. Will agreed to take part in it. https://t.co/hTWqH8VTm2

@Kimli This whole area has had police checkpoints at every block around this area, this weekend and last weekend and the weekend before that. There was a somewhat major ‚Äúprotest‚Äù on the first weekend, but downtown around Queen‚Äôs Park was local, emergency or foot traffic only. https://t.co/WTZfFWW8tu
Is there a Twitter account, like @AP_Planner (or @CanadaPlanner, which I maintain), that gives us a heads up on days with numbers like this? https://t.co/Ropw3hLndO
@skinnylatte San Francisco‚Äôs Department of Sunsets does some really good work.
I just watched Snakes on a Plane for the first time. [link] Someone I knew from university is a bit player on Snakes on a Plane. Instantly recognizable. And his personality shines through.
@domesticat I‚Äôd like to participate in that investigation, please.

@TwitterSupport Is there a way for hand-crafted tweets on accounts with the ‚ÄúAutomated‚Äù label (every now and then I have to explain something on an automated account) be not flagged as ‚ÄúAutomated‚Äù?
Long weekend, yeah!

In The Wire, when Stringer Bell and Avon Barksdale think they‚Äôre about to both be arrested, Stringer turns around and puts his hands behind his back, thinking he‚Äôs about to get handcuffed. [link] For reasons you‚Äôll know if you watch the show, the police could only get a warrant for Avon. McNulty says to Stringer, ‚ÄúCatch you later.‚Äù I thought about that scene when watching the video of Tamara Lich getting arrested but not the guy standing next to her.
‚ÄúHow long were the protesters planning to paralyze Canada‚Äôs 8th best city?‚Äù [link]
The COVID barriers inside Toronto restaurants are starting to come down.
@swartable @rtanglao üòâ [link]

@TwitterSupport @duncte123 Can you add those instructions to add a label to one‚Äôs #GoodBots to your documentation at [link] ? It wasn‚Äôt obvious to me how to do it, and found out through this tweet.
Always stay till the end.
‚ÄúOh no, WordPress died!‚Äù was my first thought when I saw the hashtag trending. [link]

@GroundhogDayMxM When you come to the minute where Phil takes his date, both dressed up in costumes, to see the movie Heidi II, can you talk about how he pauses when he says ‚ÄúThat‚Äôll be, uh, one adult and, uh‚Ä¶‚Äù and she says ‚ÄúTwo adults!‚Äù That‚Äôs weird, right?
@CatherineOmega [link]

@1Password If I‚Äôm required change my password every 3 months, I set a reminder to do it every 2 months, so I can do it at any point during the day. Even though 1Password makes the process somewhat quick, I never want to have to do it in the middle of a critical moment. Otherwise never.

It‚Äôs easy to wonder, sometimes, what lists my name is on, and what implications that has had.
I don‚Äôt see my name on a certain list that‚Äôs making the rounds currently, so that‚Äôs a good sign. (Hey, you never know. I regularly get emails intended for my Swedish namesake.) My family name, the one on my government-issued ID, is there, but no relation.
*Owen Wilson Wow* [link]
